# Acrobatic Master (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Acrobatic Master (Su)*: As a swift action, a ninja with this trick can focus her *ki* to grant her a +20 bonus on one [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] check of her choice made before the start of her next turn. Using this ability expends 1 *ki* point from her *ki* pool.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 14
